text: BREAKING: Abdulmanap Nurmagomedov, father of UFC champ Khabib Nurmagomedov, dies from Covid-19 complications aged 57 - reports https://t.co/qllLx0r2sV

entity.name: Live: The Ultimate Fighting Championship
entity.description: Mixed martial arts action from a UFC event.

entity.name: UFC 250
entity.description: The Brazilian two-weight champion cruised to a decision win over Canada's Spencer, continuing to cement her place as the consensus best women's MMA fighter of all time. Earlier on the night, bantamweights Cody Garbrandt, Aljamain Sterling and Sean O'Malley made statements with big finishes.
